Package org.walkingarchive.app

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AsyncTaskCallback
    A utility interface that emulates C#'s anonymous functions and Python's lambda functions
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CardViewerActivity
    This renders the card viewer interface for a given chunk of Card-like JSON
    DeckActivity
    Renders a list of cards in a given Deck and allows the user to add new ones
    DeckListActivity
    Displays a list of Decks that the user owns.
    ImageActivity
    Displays the Android camera and performs OCR on the captured image
    MainActivity
    Renders the main menu and runs app startup code
    SearchActivity
    Renders the Search interface and executes the search API call
    SearchResultsActivity
    Renders a list of Search Results
    TradeActivity
    Displays and updates a new or existing Trade
    TradeCardAdapter
    Formats a List for rendering
    TradeHistoryActivity
    Lists all Trades that belong to the user
